Greek Life
Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Bang for the buck
What to do for fun
Food and Dining
Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments

there are three different greek life organizations on campus, and a lot of students are involved with them. this is not a big party school, instead the organizations throw events and do a lot of community service. joining the organizations are one of the easiest ways to make friends campus.

snhu is good for all students. when i walk on campus there are students with different ethnicites everywhere, and all of us are friends with each other. also, there are a variety of interests among campus, and there are clubs to suit everybodys needs.
in the new academic building there are small glass rooms for group meetings. there is also a cafe in the building so whenever we have group work we always go to that building and do our work there.

while snhu is a private school and it is a little costly, it is definitely worth it. i feel as though the new buildings add so much value to my education. the dorms are clean, the food is terrific, and the teachers and education is the best.
we are close to the city and we can always go out somewhere on the weekends. furthermore, during the week the school is always hosting fun little activites for the students.
the food is delicious and there are always so many choices. i always feel like there is something for me to eat and enjoy.
i enjoy and hang out with everybody on my floor. depending on how many students live on your floor, it can be very fun.
it is challenging work and i have to stay on top of all of my homework. on the other hand it is not an overbearing amount and i can still have fun outside of my school work.

take a tour first and you will fall in love with the school. in you have time you should sit in on a class and you can realize how great the teachers are, ho comfortable you are with classmates, and realize that you can handle the workload.
snhu has perfect faculty, they are very good teachers and always willing to help you. the campus is beautiful and a perfect size. i am comfortable with the work load, although it is challenging.

textAfterTable: Bang for the buck Even though tuition was raised a little this year, i still feel as if it is my best opportunity, and i really am getting what i pay for! Am enjoying being here I love being at SNHU, the environment is great! The clubs on campus really put on alot of activities and chances to meet other students, and on campus generally everyone is really nice! Am learning a lot I would definately say I am learning alot! The pofessors at SNHU really get to know you in class so if you have a question, or miss understand something they are very easy to reach, and they know who you are! At the begining of each semester you are provided with your professors email address and phone number as well as office hours so you can reach them with in minutes! I am a Sophomore at SNHU and i would say i have already learned more than i feel i did in High School, the courses they set out for students to take are really very important and you feel like your being educated when your in class!
